alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 1:49AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Union and east central Columbia Counties, northwestern Union and northeastern Claiborne Parishes through 130 AM CST... At 1248 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Smackover to near Village. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Smackover, Norphlet, Junction City, Calion, Mount Holly, Wesson, Lisbon, Urbana, Lawson, Village, Lillie, Newell, New London, Pigeon Hill, Kenova, Spotville, Catesville, Hew Hope and Taylorville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central and southwestern Arkansas.
